00037 typedef struct
00038 {
00039   uint8_t       activeChannel; 
00040   ShortAddr_t   shortAddr;     
00041   PanId_t       PANId;         
00042   uint64_t      extPANId;      
00043   ShortAddr_t   parentAddr;    
00044 
00045 
00046   ZDO_Status_t  status;
00047 } ZDO_StartNetworkConf_t;
00048 
00049 /**************************************************************************/
00052 typedef struct
00053 {
00055   struct
00056   {
00057     void  *next;
00058 #ifdef _ZAPPSI_
00059     /* to be compatible with MAC and SSP service. */
00060     uint8_t requestId;
00061     /* Sequence number to identify request-response pair. */
00062     uint8_t sequenceNumber;
00063     union
00064     {
00065       /* Callback wrapper routine pointer */
00066       void (*callback)(void*);
00067       /* Processing routine pointer to call after required memory will become free */
00068       void (*process)(void*);
00069     } zsi;
00070 #endif /* _ZAPPSI_ */
00071   } service; 
00072 
00074   ZDO_StartNetworkConf_t confirm;  
00075 #ifdef _LIGHT_LINK_PROFILE_
00076   ShortAddr_t            parent;  
00077 #endif // _LIGHT_LINK_PROFILE_
00078 
00079   void (*ZDO_StartNetworkConf)(ZDO_StartNetworkConf_t *conf);
00080 } ZDO_StartNetworkReq_t;
00081

00088 } ZDO_ResetNetworkConf_t;

00090 /**************************************************************************/
00093 typedef struct
00094 {
00096   struct
00097   {
00098 #ifdef _ZAPPSI_
00099     void  *next;
00100     /* Sequence number to identify request-response pair. */
00101     uint8_t sequenceNumber;
00102     /* to be compatible with MAC and SSP service. */
00103     uint8_t requestId;
00104     union
00105     {
00106       /* Callback wrapper routine pointer */
00107       void (*callback)(void*);
00108       /* Processing routine pointer to call after required memory will become free */
00109       void (*process)(void*);
00110     } zsi;
00111 #endif /* _ZAPPSI_ */
00112     APS_ResetReq_t apsResetReq;
00113   } service; 
00114

00117   void (*ZDO_ResetNetworkConf)(ZDO_ResetNetworkConf_t *conf); 
00118 } ZDO_ResetNetworkReq_t;

00219 typedef struct PACK _NeighborTableList_t
00220 {

00223   ShortAddr_t      networkAddr;

00225     uint8_t          deviceType : 2,
00226     uint8_t          rxOnWhenIdle : 2,
00227     uint8_t          relationship : 3,
00228     uint8_t          reserved1 : 1
00229   ))
00230   LITTLE_ENDIAN_OCTET(2, (
00231     uint8_t          permitJoining : 2,
00232     uint8_t          reserved2 : 6
00233   ))
00234   uint8_t          depth;
00235   uint8_t          lqi;
00236 } NeighborTableList_t;

01033 /**************************************************************************/
01036 typedef struct PACK
01037 {
01038   uint8_t seqNum; 
01039   // user part
01040   uint8_t status; 
01041   union PACK
01042   {
01043     ZDO_NwkAddrResp_t               nwkAddrResp; 
01044     ZDO_IeeeAddrResp_t              ieeeAddrResp; 
01045     ZDO_NodeDescResp_t              nodeDescResp; 
01046     ZDO_PowerDescResp_t             powerDescResp; 
01047     ZDO_SimpleDescResp_t            simpleDescResp; 
01048     ZDO_ComplexDescResp_t           complexDescResp; 
01049     ZDO_UserDescResp_t              userDescResp; 
01050     ZDO_ActiveEPResp_t              activeEPResp; 
01051     ZDO_UserDescConfResp_t          userDescConfResp; 
01052     ZDO_SystemServerDiscoveryResp_t systemServerDiscoveryResp; 
01053 #ifdef _BINDING_
01054     ZDO_MatchDescResp_t             matchDescResp;      
01055     ZDO_BindResp_t                  bindResp;           
01056     ZDO_UnbindResp_t                unbindResp;         
01057     ZDO_MgmtBindResp_t              mgmtBindResp;       
01058 #endif // _BINDING_
01059     ZDO_MgmtLqiResp_t               mgmtLqiResp;        
01060     ZDO_MgmtNwkUpdateNotf_t         mgmtNwkUpdateNotf;  
01061     ZDO_MgmtRtgResp_t               mgmtRtgResp;        
01062 #ifdef _CHILD_MANAGEMENT_
01063 #ifdef _PARENT_ANNCE_
01064     ZDO_ParentAnnceReq_t            parentAnnce;       
01065 #endif
01066 #endif    
01067   };
01068 } ZDO_ZdpRespFrame_t;
01069 
01070 /**************************************************************************/
01073 typedef struct PACK
01074 {
01075   uint8_t seqNum; 
01076   // user part
01077   union PACK
01078   {
01079     ZDO_NwkAddrReq_t                           nwkAddrReq; 
01080     ZDO_IeeeAddrReq_t                          ieeeAddrReq; 
01081     ZDO_NodeDescReq_t                          nodeDescReq; 
01082     ZDO_PowerDescReq_t                         powerDescReq; 
01083     ZDO_SimpleDescReq_t                        simpleDescReq; 
01084     ZDO_DeviceAnnceReq_t                       deviceAnnce; 
01085     ZDO_ActiveEPReq_t                          activeEPReq; 
01086     ZDO_ComplexDescReq_t                       complexDescReq; 
01087     ZDO_UserDescReq_t                          userDescReq; 
01088     ZDO_UserDescSetReq_t                       userDescSetReq; 
01089     ZDO_SystemServerDiscoveryReq_t             systemServerDiscoveryReq; 
01090 #ifdef _BINDING_
01091     ZDO_MatchDescReq_t                         matchDescReq;      
01092     ZDO_EndDeviceBindReq_t                     endDeviceBindReq;  
01093     ZDO_BindReq_t                              bindReq;           
01094     ZDO_UnbindReq_t                            unbindReq;         
01095     ZDO_MgmtBindReq_t                          mgmtBindReq;       
01096 #endif // _BINDING_
01097     ZDO_MgmtLeaveReq_t                         mgmtLeaveReq; 
01098     ZDO_MgmtPermitJoiningReq_t                 mgmtPermitJoiningReq; 
01099     ZDO_MgmtNwkUpdateReq_t                     mgmtNwkUpdateReq; 
01100     ZDO_MgmtNwkUpdateNotf_t                    mgmtNwkUpdateNotf; 
01101     ZDO_MgmtNwkUnsolicatedEnhancedUpdateNotf_t mgmtNwkUnsolicatedEnhancedUpdateNotf;
01102     ZDO_MgmtLqiReq_t                           mgmtLqiReq; 
01103     ZDO_MgmtRtgReq_t                           mgmtRtgReq; 
01104 #ifdef _CHILD_MANAGEMENT_
01105 #ifdef _PARENT_ANNCE_
01106     ZDO_ParentAnnceReq_t                       parentAnnce; 
01107 #endif
01108 #endif
01109   };
01110 } ZDO_ZdpReqFrame_t;
01111 
01112 /**************************************************************************/
01115 typedef struct PACK
01116 {
01117   TOP_GUARD
01118   uint8_t header[APS_ASDU_OFFSET];
01119   union PACK
01120   {
01123     ZDO_ZdpRespFrame_t respPayload;
01125     ZDO_ZdpReqFrame_t  reqPayload;
01126   };
01127 #if (APS_AFFIX_LENGTH - APS_ASDU_OFFSET)
01128   uint8_t footer[APS_AFFIX_LENGTH - APS_ASDU_OFFSET];
01129 #endif
01130   BOTTOM_GUARD
01131 } ZDO_ZdpFrame_t;
01132 END_PACK
01133 
01134 /**************************************************************************/
01137 typedef struct
01138 {
01139   APS_AddrMode_t srcAddrMode; 
01140   APS_Address_t srcAddress;
01141   ZDO_ZdpRespFrame_t respPayload; 
01142 } ZDO_ZdpResp_t;
01143 
01144 /**************************************************************************/
01147 typedef struct
01148 {
01149   //\cond internal
01150   struct
01151   {
01152     void *next;
01153 #ifdef _ZAPPSI_
01154     /* to be compatible with MAC and SSP service. */
01155     uint8_t requestId;
01156     /* Sequence number to identify request-response pair. */
01157     uint8_t sequenceNumber;
01158     union
01159     {
01160       /* Callback wrapper routine pointer */
01161       void (*callback)(void*);
01162       /* Processing routine pointer to call after required memory will become free */
01163       void (*process)(void*);
01164     } zsi;
01165 #endif /* _ZAPPSI_ */
01166     uint32_t ttl;
01167     uint8_t state;
01168     uint8_t seqNumCopy;  //used to prevent seq number encription
01169     APS_DataReq_t apsDataReq;
01170   } service;
01171   //\endcond
01172 
01173   // Address fields
01174   uint16_t   reqCluster; 
01175   APS_AddrMode_t dstAddrMode; 
01176   APS_Address_t dstAddress;
01177   // ZDP frame for sending out
01178   ZDO_ZdpFrame_t req; 
01179   //Callback and Response
01180   void (*ZDO_ZdpResp)(ZDO_ZdpResp_t *zdpResp); 
01181   ZDO_ZdpResp_t resp; 
01182 } ZDO_ZdpReq_t;
01183 
01184 /**************************************************************************/
01187 typedef struct
01188 {

01190   uint8_t      lqi; 
01192   int8_t      rssi;

01215 /**************************************************************************/

01219 {
01220   uint8_t txPower; 
01223   void (* ZDO_SetTxPowerConf)(ZDO_SetTxPowerConf_t *conf); 
01224   ZDO_SetTxPowerConf_t confirm; 
01225 } ZDO_SetTxPowerReq_t;
01226

01233   ZDO_OUT_NETWORK_STATUS 
01234 } ZDO_NwkStatus_t;
